nodes.text: Jackie Burroughs (February 2, 1939 – September 22, 2010) was a Canadian voice actress who voiced Morag in the Ewoks cartoon show. She is primarily known for portraying elderly, disagreeable women. Although often a live-screen actress, Burroughs has several voice-acting credits to her name besides Star Wars: Ewoks, including roles in The Care Bears Movie, and the cult film, Heavy Metal.
